task.title: How to group objects?
task.shortdesc: You can treat multiple object as a single unit by combining them into a group.

taskbody.prereq: You have created a new project using a preset artboard or a custom project.

context.p: You will be able to group objects in your project in Adobe XD.

You can combine several objects into a group when you want to treat the objects as a single unit. You can then move or scale them without affecting their relative positions. You can also apply one fill color to them.

step.cmd: Click on objects to select them.
Right click while holding the Shift key to open the options menu.

result.p: As a result after following the steps above you will have grouped objects in Adobe XD.

example.p: In order to work with multiple objects as a single object, you need to group them. You can group objects in a logo design so that you can move and scale the logo as a single unit.
